OTP_SENT_MSG: EN: OTP has been sent to {{PHONE_NUMBER}}.
OTP_MAX_RETRY_EXCEPTION: EN: Max retry limit "{{MAX_RETRY_LIMIT}}" of OTP reached, please retry after "{{RESET_OTP_RETRY_HOURS}}" hours
USER_BLOCKED: EN: You are blocked contact admin at "{{ADMIN_CONTACT}}".
OTP_VERIFICATION_SUCCESS: EN: OTP verification has been successful.
OTP_EXPIRY_SEC_NOT_DEFINED: EN: OTP expiry seconds not defined in settings.
OTP_ERROR_WRONG_OR_EXPIRED: EN: OTP is incorrect or expired (entered after "{{OTP_EXPIRY_SECONDS}}" seconds).
